mapper.select: SELECT m.teacher_id, m.teacher_email, m.teacher_phone, m.teacher_name, m.teacher_gender, m.teacher_birth, m.teacher_address_main, m.teacher_address_sub, m.teacher_image, m.teacher_accessdate, m.teacher_info, c.career_no, c.account_id, c.career_content, c.career_startdate, c.career_enddate, l.license_no, l.license_number, l.license_name, l.license_agency, l.license_getdate FROM teacher m LEFT JOIN career c ON c.account_id = m.teacher_id LEFT JOIN license l ON l.account_id = m.teacher_id WHERE Teacher_id = #{TeacherId}
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher SET teacher_email = #{teacherEmail}, teacher_phone = #{teacherPhone}, teacher_name = #{teacherName}, teacher_gender = #{teacherGender}, teacher_birth = #{teacherBirth}, teacher_address_main = #{teacherAddressMain}, teacher_address_sub = #{teacherAddressSub}, teacher_Info = #{teacherInfo}, teacher_updatedate = now() WHERE teacher_id = #{teacherId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO career( account_id, career_content, career_startdate, career_enddate ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{careerContent}, #{careerStartdate}, #{careerEnddate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher SET teacher_updatedate = now() WHERE teacher_id = #{accountId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO license( account_id, license_number, license_name, license_agency, license_getdate ) VALUE ( #{accountId}, #{licenseNumber}, #{licenseName}, #{licenseAgency}, #{licenseGetdate} )
